parameter.name: udn
parameter.label: Unique Device Name
parameter.description: The UDN identifies the Sonos device.

parameter.name: notificationTimeout
parameter.label: Notification Timeout
parameter.description: Specifies the amount of time in seconds for which the notification sound will be played

parameter.name: notificationVolume
parameter.label: Notification Sound Volume
parameter.description: Specifies the volume in percent applied to a notification sound

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Specifies the refresh interval in seconds
